# Protection From Good (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]] \[[[Evil Spells|evil]]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Adept Spells|Adept 1]], [[1st Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 1]], [[Diabolic (Domain)|Diabolic 1]], [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[1st Level Summoner Spells|Summoner 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 2]], [[BoXM 2nd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 2]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M/DF

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** 1 minute/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** No; see text

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 328

This spell functions like *[[Protection From Evil (Spell)|protection from evil]]*, except that the deflection and resistance bonuses apply to attacks made by good creatures. The target receives a new saving throw against control by good creatures and good summoned creatures cannot touch the target.
